attributes.action: make the sale, and use, of choke chains, prong collars, and similar "training" devices illegal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Choke chains have been proven to cause a multitude of health and behavioural problems in dogs, even though there are many methods of training dogs which give better, faster results, some people still persist with choke chains.

Harnesses, haltis, and getting help from a registered dog trainer, are just some of the alternatives available to everyone.
